messages.subject: dreadlocks
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 1/31/03 4:20:05 AM Central Standard Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 1/31/03 4:20:05 AM Central Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< I had pangs about her beautiful long hair but its her hair, not mine. >>

I had to learn this the hard way. My dd asked for me to cut off her hair, I
put her off... "wait until you're a bit older" hoping she would change her
mind.
One night while I was at work, she saw her opportunity. I came home to her
beautiful long hair in several differnent chunky lengths due to her very
unique cutting process!!
We had to get it cut up to her ear lobes to even it out.
Now she is sad it isn't longer.
But it was a good learning experience for us both!
I hadn't taken her seriously becuase she wasn't very persistent about the
hair cut.
But when she asks to get her hair cut next time, you can bet I will be
booking an appoinment. duh.

Ren
"The sun is shining--the sun is shining. That is the magic. The flowers are
growing--the roots are stirring. That is the magic. Being alive is the
magic--being strong is the magic The magic is in me--the magic is in
me....It's in every one of us."

----Frances Hodgson
Burnett

YOu don't have to use the wax. I have never used it. Or shoudl I say my

them.
Pam G

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] dreadlocks
messages.msgSnippet: ... They have to be cut out. Theoretically in the first week you can get them out as they are just tangled hair, not proper matted dreads but because wax is
messages.messageBody:
starsuncloud@... wrote:

> In a message dated 1/30/03 7:58:07 PM Central Standard Time,
> Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
>
> << After a while it will
> stay just fine. >>
>
> How about getting the dreads out? Is it hard?
>
> Ren

They have to be cut out. Theoretically in the first week you can get them out as they are just tangled hair, not proper matted dreads but because wax is used it has too be washed off with very hot water
and then the hair untangled its very hard and time consuming.
She wants short Sinead O'Connor style at some point so if she goes off the dreads then no probs.
I had pangs about her beautiful long hair but its her hair, not mine.

Shyrley
